mapper.update: update sys_user set account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_name = #{user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{user_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dept_id = #{dept_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, locked = #{locked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usable = #{usable,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, account, password, sex, user_name, avatar, user_type, dept_id, locked, usable from sys_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, account, password, sex, user_name, avatar, user_type, dept_id, locked, usable from sys_user
